cleaned_text: Reiki Reiki Near Me Would you like to return your body, mind, and spirit to their natural states of balance and well-being? Through gentle, light-touch treatment, sessions at Body Positive Works can assist with addiction recovery, including eating disorders and body dysmorphia; the release of anxiety and relief from depression; and breaking mental habit patterns and calming racing thoughts, allowing the mind to naturally move toward a more positive perspective. Shown to support the reduction of discomfort from side effects of medical treatments, such as chemotherapy, and to aid in healing from injuries and surgeries, Reiki can also help you to achieve a greater sense of calm, gain restful sleep, and balance your immune system functioning. Some people may experience the calming effects of Reiki immediately, while others can report a subtle shift over time. Our Reiki Master creates treatments around the individual, listening to your needs and developing sessions that empower and celebrate you. Looking for Reiki Near Me? Our Reiki treatments last 60 minutes. During each treatment, you will be lying down and fully clothed, but you may choose whether the practitioner touches you (lightly) or not at all. If you feel a sensation that you'd like to discuss, please do ask. It's important that you feel relaxed as that, after all, is the point of Reiki. You will receive instructions on how to take these practices home with you and use them in your everyday life.
